title: Novartis to Sell Roche Stake for $20.7 Billion
sub_head: Share sale, which ends unusual entanglement of Swiss drug giants, hands Novartis a war chest for deals
body:
Novartis AG said it would sell its stake in Roche Holding AG back to its crosstown rival for $20.7 billion, bringing an end to the unusual, decadeslong entanglement of the two Swiss drug giants.
The deal announced Thursday hands Novartis a war chest for potential acquisitions, while for Roche, it removes a major competitor from its shareholder register and will boost earnings per share.
